attributes.value: / // Run the executor until the task complets.
/     // Run the main future on the current thread.

defs.name: spawn
defs.value:
pub fn spawn<T: Send + 'a, impl Future<Output = T> + Send + 'a: Future<Output
             = T> + Send + 'a>(&Self, impl Future<Output = T> + Send + 'a)
-> Task<T>
defs.docs: Spawns a task onto the executor.

attributes.value: / Spawns a task onto the executor.

defs.name: try_tick
defs.docs: Attempts to run a task if at least one is scheduled.

attributes.value: / Attempts to run a task if at least one is scheduled.
/ Running a scheduled task means simply polling its future once.

defs.name: tick
defs.value: pub async fn tick<'_>(&'_ Self) -> /*impl Trait*/

attributes.value: / Running a task means simply polling its future once.
/ If no tasks are scheduled when this method is called, it will wait until one is scheduled.

defs.name: run
defs.value:
pub async fn run<T, '_, impl Future<Output = T>: Future<Output =
                 T>>(&'_ Self, impl Future<Output = T>) -> /*impl Trait*/
defs.docs: Runs the executor until the given future completes.

attributes.value: / Runs the executor until the given future completes.
/ The executor can only be run on the thread that created it.

defs.name: spawn
defs.value:
pub fn spawn<T: 'a, impl Future<Output = T> + 'a: Future<Output = T> +
             'a>(&Self, impl Future<Output = T> + 'a) -> Task<T>
defs.docs: Spawns a task onto the executor.
